title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: void Developing algorithms, Programming preliminaries, Numeric constants and variables, Data type declaration, Arithmetic operators and expressions, Input and Output statements, Sequential and conditional statements, loops, Arrays and its applications, Logical expressions, Functions, Character strings, Structures, Pointer data type and its applications, Stacks, Lists and Trees, Recursion, Bit level operations.
